Common mechanical or electronic components
that are covered include:

Engine

Engine failure can leave you stranded and facing significant repair costs. Our comprehensive warranties provide coverage for this unforeseen event.

Gearbox

Grinding gears, difficulty shifting, or unexpected slippage can all be signs of a failing gearbox. These issues can lead to expensive repairs.

Cooling System

Is your car overheating? These could indicate a cooling system failure. A malfunctioning cooling system can lead to significant engine damage.

Sensors

Is your check engine light on? These could be signs of a malfunctioning sensor. Sensors play a vital role in engine performance.

Fuel System

Is your car experiencing hesitation, stalling, or failing to start? These symptoms could point to a fuel system malfunction.

Audio Systems

Does your favorite music sound distorted? Are you experiencing crackling noises? These could indicate an audio system failure.
